title: Software Engineer
job_function: Information Technology, Consulting, and Business Development
description:
**Job Title: ETL Informatica Developer** 




**Opening: 2** 




**Experience\\- 4 to 7years** 




**Location: Kolkata, ITC** 




**Mode of interview\\- 1st round through MS teams and final round Face to face.** 




**Required\\- Immediate joiners.** 




**Job Description:** 
 As an ETL Informatica Developer, Candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into our data warehouse. Candidate will work closely with cross\\-functional teams to understand data requirements, perform data analysis, and ensure data quality and integrity. This role requires expertise in ETL Informatica, Oracle SQL, data analysis, and effective communication skills.
 



**Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain ETL processes using Informatica PowerCenter to extract, transform, and load data from heterogeneous sources into the data warehouse.
* Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into ETL specifications.
* Perform data analysis and profiling to identify data quality issues and recommend data cleansing and transformation rules.
* Write SQL queries and scripts to extract and manipulate data from relational databases.
* Create and maintain documentation for ETL processes, including data mappings, transformations, and workflows.
* Perform unit testing and debugging of ETL processes to ensure accuracy and efficiency.
* Collaborate with the database administration team to optimize ETL performance and troubleshoot any issues.
* Support the development of data models and data architecture to ensure scalability and data integrity.
* Communicate effectively with stakeholders to understand their requirements and provide timely updates on project progress.



**Requirements:** 



* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or a related field.
* 2\\-3 years of experience as an ETL Informatica Developer or similar role.
* Strong proficiency in ETL Informatica PowerCenter, including designing mappings, transformations, and workflows.
* Sound knowledge of Oracle SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and querying from relational databases.
* Experience with data analysis and data profiling techniques.
* Familiarity with data modelling concepts and dimensional data warehouse design principles.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Detail\\-oriented with a focus on data accuracy and quality.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Experience with scheduling tools such as Control\\-M or Autosys is a plus.
* Knowledge of scripting languages such as Shell scripting or Python is desirable but not mandatory.

title: TTT - Manual plus Automation - Staff
description:
At EY, we‚Äôre all in to shape your future with confidence.
   

  

 We‚Äôll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.
   

  

 Join EY and help to build a better working world.
   

  

**Staff Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer**
**Summary:**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Staff QA Engineer with a maximum of 5 years of experience in both Manual and Automated testing. The ideal candidate will be a critical thinker, proficient in modern QA practices, and possess hands\\-on experience with industry\\-leading automation tools, specifically Selenium and Playwright. This role is pivotal in driving our product quality and fostering continuous improvement within our testing processes.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Requirements and Test Strategy:**
* Actively participate in requirement analysis and collaborate with product and development teams to clarify Use Cases and User Stories.
* Proactively seek and document clarifications to resolve ambiguities and maintain a clear understanding of project scope.
* Design comprehensive Test Scenarios and detailed Test Cases, ensuring complete traceability to initial requirements.
* Conduct timely and thorough reviews of test artifacts prepared by peers and other team members.


**Execution and Defect Management:**
* Execute Manual and Automated test cases across various testing types (e.g., Regression, Smoke, System, API, Mobile/Web).
* Utilize expertise in Selenium and Playwright to develop, maintain, and execute robust automation scripts.
* Perform REST/SOAP API testing using tools like Postman.
* Identify, categorize, and report defects/bugs accurately, providing clear steps to reproduce.
* Collaborate closely with the Development team to facilitate issue resolution and track defects to closure.
* Immediately raise flags for critical issues, blockers, or major impediments.


**Quality and Process Improvement:**
* Manage and own QA deliverables, ensuring all assigned tasks meet established quality criteria and timelines.
* Strive to continually raise the standards of QA processes, procedures, and documentation within the team.
* Monitor the progress and quality of the project, proactively managing and mitigating any arising hindrances.
* Be accountable for all assigned QA tasks, focusing on delivering a consistently high\\-quality final product.


**Required Qualifications And Skills**
* Experience: Around 5 years in QA software testing, including both functional and non\\-functional testing, within complex, project\\-based environments.


**Automation Expertise (Hands\\-on is Mandatory):**
* Demonstrated experience in developing and maintaining robust test automation frameworks using Selenium and Playwright.
* Practical experience and strong proficiency with Playwright.


**Technical \\& Testing Skills:**
* Proven experience in REST/SOAP API testing using tools such as Postman.
* Hands\\-on experience with SQL queries, including knowledge of joins and views.
* Experience in testing both Mobile and Web applications.
* Solid understanding of various testing types (e.g., Black\\-box, White\\-box, Regression, Smoke, Sanity, System, Accessibility).


**Process \\& Tools:**
* Deep operational experience within the Agile/SCRUM; knowledge of SAFe is a plus.
* Hands\\-on experience with Test Management tools (e.g., ALM, JIRA, Azure DevOps).
* Strong background working within a standard Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).


**Soft Skills:**
* Excellent communication (written and verbal) and collaborative skills for working effectively within cross\\-functional and intercultural teams.
* Proven ability to work independently, demonstrating strong rational analysis and logical thinking.
* Great team player with strong interpersonal skills and a solid work ethic.
* Commitment to continuous learning and improvement in software testing best practices.


**EY \\| Building a better working world**
 EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.
   

  

 Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
   

  

 EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi\\-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps
description:
**üíª MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps \\| Virtual Internship \\| Flexible Timing \\| Real Industry Projects** 




 We‚Äôre accelerating our product engineering pipeline and onboarding execution\\-focused talent as
 **MERN Stack Developer Interns** 
 . This internship provides deep, hands\\-on exposure to
 **full\\-stack application development** 
 , covering everything from UI components to backend logic and database operations.
 



**Note:** 
 This is
 *not* 
 a stipend\\-based internship.\\*
 



**üîπ Internship Snapshot** 



* **Role:** 
 MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps
* **Mode:** 
 100% Virtual Internship
* **Timing:** 
 Fully Flexible ‚Äî ideal for students managing academic workloads
* **Compensation:** 
 Unpaid; value delivered through real engineering project exposure
* **Eligibility:** 
 Students \\& freshers with foundational knowledge of MERN technologies



**üîπ What You Will Work On (Project Scope)** 




 Interns will build and deploy
 **real, industry\\-oriented full\\-stack applications** 
 , including:
 


* **Front\\-end:** 
 React components, state management, responsive UI
* **Back\\-end:** 
 Node.js \\& Express\\-based API development
* **Database:** 
 MongoDB schema design, queries, aggregation pipelines
* **Authentication \\& Authorization:** 
 JWT\\-based access workflows
* **Integration:** 
 Connecting APIs, UI, and databases into a cohesive system
* **Deployment simulations:** 
 Git workflows, hosting basics, environment variables



 These deliverables simulate real full\\-stack engineering environments.
 



**üîπ Core Responsibilities** 



* Develop modular, reusable full\\-stack features
* Build and integrate REST APIs
* Maintain clean, well\\-documented codebases
* Debug and optimize both frontend and backend components
* Collaborate with design and backend teams for seamless integration
* Deliver milestones aligned with sprint/project timelines
* Participate in code reviews and iteration cycles



**üîπ What You Gain** 



* End\\-to\\-end full\\-stack development experience
* Portfolio\\-ready applications showcasing complete MERN workflows
* Exposure to real engineering methodologies and best practices
* Flexible timings with output\\-driven expectations
* Completion certificate based on performance
* Strong readiness for full\\-stack and product engineering roles



**üîπ Ideal Candidate Profile** 



* Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React
* Basic experience with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
* Strong problem\\-solving orientation
* Comfortable converting requirements into functional modules
* Ownership\\-driven, consistent, and detail\\-focused

title: Engineer, Quality Assurance
description:
**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status. EEO/Disabled/Vets
   

  

**Job Description :**
 QA Engineer
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled QA Engineer, with a strong product and systems
   

  

 mindset. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in scaling and enhancing our
   

  

 automation frameworks, while driving quality across Web and API platforms.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Perform exploratory testing on web and mobile platforms to ensure


 high\\-quality releases.
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain automation test scripts using tools like


 Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, or equivalent.
   

  

* Execute automated tests and report results with defects and logs.
* Integrate test automation into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI, GitLab


 CI).
   

  

* Collaborate with development and QA teams to identify system requirements


 and resolve issues.
   

  

* Conduct API testing using tools like Postman, REST Assured, or SoapUI.
* Maintain and enhance automation frameworks and utilities for reusability and


 scalability.
   

  

* Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in test


 automation.
   

  

* Perform root cause analysis for defects and recommend improvements.
* Document test results, test coverage, and automation metrics.


**Skills And Experience**
* 3\\+ years of Strong experience in automation testing using Cypress,


 Playwright,Selenium/WebDriver, TestNG, Junit, or Cucumber.
   

  

* Proficiency in programming languages like Java, or JavaScript.
* Solid understanding of automation frameworks (POM, BDD, Hybrid).
* Hands\\-on experience with API testing and automation.
* Knowledge of version control systems like Git.
* Experience with bug tracking and test management tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail,


 Zephyr).
   

  

* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.


**Preferred Skills**
* Experience in Performance/Load/ Accessibility testing.
* ISTQB Certification or similar.


 How We‚Äôll Support You
   

  

* Training and development to help you excel in your career
* Coaching and support from experts in your team
* A culture of continuous learning to aid progression


 This job is posted with NTS Technology Services Pvt. Ltd.

title: Technical Lead
description:
**Job Summary**
 We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer / Technical Lead to lead the development of scalable, high\\-performance backend systems that support critical airline operations and customer\\-facing applications. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in technical leadership, enjoys mentoring teams, and is passionate about building reliable, cost\\-efficient systems using modern backend technologies. While the primary focus of this role is backend engineering and technical leadership, experience or familiarity with AI/ML concepts and data engineering practices is a plus. You may occasionally collaborate with data teams to support intelligent features and data\\-driven systems.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the design, development, and deployment of backend services and APIs.
* Drive technical architecture, design reviews, and engineering best practices.
* Manage and mentor a team of backend engineers, ensuring high\\-quality delivery and continuous improvement.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including product, infrastructure, and business stakeholders.
* Ensure systems are optimized for scalability, performance, and cost\\-efficiency.
* Define and track technical KPIs, including system uptime, latency, and resource utilization.
* Evaluate and adopt appropriate streaming technologies and orchestration tools to support real\\-time and batch processing needs.


**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* 7\\+ years of backend development experience using Python, Java, JavaScript, or similar languages.
* Strong understanding of backend architecture, API design, and microservices.
* Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and data modeling.
* Proven ability to lead engineering teams and manage project delivery.
* Hands\\-on experience with cloud platforms, especially AWS and GCP.
* Familiarity with streaming platforms (e.g., Apache Kafka, Google Pub/Sub) and workflow orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Prefect).
* Experience with performance monitoring, benchmarking, and cost optimization.


**Good To Have**
* Prior experience in the airline, travel, or transportation domain.
* Exposure to observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog).
* Experience working in agile environments and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams.


**Educational Qualification**
 Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Akasa Air Head Office \\- Mumbai
   

  

**Akasa Air does not solicit or accept any form of payment from candidates or institutions during its recruitment process. Any such claims are fraudulent and should be disregarded.**
**Individuals engaging with unauthorized entities do so at their own risk. We encourage you to report any such incidents to info@akasaair.com for appropriate action.**

title: Senior Analyst
description:

**Job Summary:**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **.NET Developer** 
 with strong expertise in

 and

* Develop and maintain applications using .NET Core and related technologies.

* Participate in all phases of SDLC including requirement analysis, design, development, testing, and deployment.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.

* Work independently with minimal supervision and take ownership of deliverables.

**About The Team**
 eClerx is a global leader in productized services, bringing together people, technology and domain expertise to amplify business results. Our mission is to set the benchmark for client service and success in our industry. Our vision is to be the innovation partner of choice for technology, data analytics and process management services. Since our inception in 2000, we've partnered with top companies across various industries, including financial services, telecommunications, retail, and high\\-tech. Our innovative solutions and domain expertise help businesses optimize operations, improve efficiency, and drive growth. With over 18,000 employees worldwide, eClerx is dedicated to delivering excellence through smart automation and data\\-driven insights. At eClerx, we believe in nurturing talent and providing hands\\-on experience.

title: Windows Developer IRC283716
description:
**Description**
 looking for a .NET developer to join our team. This position is for a well\\-rounded individual with solid experience in the .NET environment, to contribute to substantial new mobile projects on Windows tablets. This person is comfortable writing WPF desktop, ASP.NET, or UWP applications, and has a firm grasp of MVVM principles. This person is accomplished in the full software development stack, from UI to data storage.
   

  

 Professionally, this person is driven to execute, deliver, and complete projects independently, seeking advice and direction from team members when needed, and plowing ahead to completion when the path forward is clear. This person will be able to point to specific examples that highlight the individual‚Äôs ability to meet the objectives outlined above, and references will confirm this person‚Äôs unique abilities.
   

  

**Requirements**
 Technologies and Skills:
   

  

 Deep knowledge of C\\#, .NET, and Visual Studio.
   

  

 MVVM and XAML.
   

  

 Eye for good UI/UX.
   

  

 Experience building a cleanly decoupled solution.
   

  

 Experience with modern asynchronous programming paradigms.
   

  

 Ability to collaborate effectively with technical partners.
   

  

 Job responsibilities
   

  

 Design, develop, and maintain high\\-performance Windows software applications using C\\#, C, and C\\+\\+. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define requirements, architect solutions, and deliver features with strong focus on quality, reliability, and security. Troubleshoot complex issues, optimize performance, and support legacy systems while driving modernization initiatives. Mentor junior engineers and promote best practices in coding, testing, and documentation.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

**Culture of caring.** 
 At GlobalLogic, we prioritize a culture of caring. Across every region and department, at every level, we consistently put people first. From day one, you‚Äôll experience an inclusive culture of acceptance and belonging, where you‚Äôll have the chance to build meaningful connections with collaborative teammates, supportive managers, and compassionate leaders.
   

  

**Learning and development.** 
 We are committed to your continuous learning and development. You‚Äôll learn and grow daily in an environment with many opportunities to try new things, sharpen your skills, and advance your career at GlobalLogic. With our Career Navigator tool as just one example, GlobalLogic offers a rich array of programs, training curricula, and hands\\-on opportunities to grow personally and professionally.
   

  

**Interesting \\& meaningful work.** 
 GlobalLogic is known for engineering impact for and with clients around the world. As part of our team, you‚Äôll have the chance to work on projects that matter. Each is a unique opportunity to engage your curiosity and creative problem\\-solving skills as you help clients reimagine what‚Äôs possible and bring new solutions to market. In the process, you‚Äôll have the privilege of working on some of the most cutting\\-edge and impactful solutions shaping the world today.
   

  

**Balance and flexibility.** 
 We believe in the importance of balance and flexibility. With many functional career areas, roles, and work arrangements, you can explore ways of achieving the perfect balance between your work and life. Your life extends beyond the office, and we always do our best to help you integrate and balance the best of work and life, having fun along the way!
   

  

**High\\-trust organization.** 
 We are a high\\-trust organization where integrity is key. By joining GlobalLogic, you‚Äôre placing your trust in a safe, reliable, and ethical global company. Integrity and trust are a cornerstone of our value proposition to our employees and clients. You will find truthfulness, candor, and integrity in everything we do.
   

  

**About GlobalLogic**
 GlobalLogic, a Hitachi Group Company, is a trusted digital engineering partner to the world‚Äôs largest and most forward\\-thinking companies. Since 2000, we‚Äôve been at the forefront of the digital revolution ‚Äì helping create some of the most innovative and widely used digital products and experiences. Today we continue to collaborate with clients in transforming businesses and redefining industries through intelligent products, platforms, and services.

title: Snowflake
description:
As a Snowflake Sr. Developer, you will build scalable, secure, and high\\-performance Snowflake pipelines across multiple projects and teams. Your typical day will involve collaborating with Team Leads to ensure alignment with the design of the architecture. From CoE perspective, you will support delivery teams,and contribute to the execution of POVs and POCs including GenAI.

title: Pipeline designer/Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Petrochem Designs, established on 2020, is a rapidly growing engineering and design firm providing cutting\\-edge, cost\\-efficient solutions for various process industries, including Oil \\& Gas, Power, and Food Processing. Known for its expertise, the company delivers comprehensive engineering services in Process, Piping, Mechanical, Electrical \\& Instrumentation, and Civil \\& Structural disciplines. Petrochem Designs integrates international standards such as ASME, API, ASTM, IS, and IEC to ensure precision and reliability. Specializing in automation and custom software development for tools like AVEVA E3D and Autodesk Plant 3D, the company focuses on enhancing workflows and project efficiency. With advanced 3D modeling and intelligent project management, Petrochem Designs is committed to delivering sustainable, innovative solutions to its industry partners.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a contract role for a Pipeline Designer/Engineer based in Chennai with a hybrid work model, allowing flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home. The responsibilities for this role include preparing and reviewing pipeline designs, conducting project\\-specific design calculations, and utilizing various computer\\-aided design (CAD) tools for detailed layouts and equipment modeling. Additionally, the role involves collaborating with cross\\-disciplinary teams to ensure compliance with project specifications and international standards. The candidate will also optimize designs for efficiency, safety, and feasibility within the scope of diverse process industries.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Design Engineering and Product Design, with experience in pipeline and piping systems.
* Strong understanding of Mechanical Engineering principles and their application to industrial processes.
* Hands\\-on experience with Computer\\-Aided Design (CAD) tools and 3D modeling software.
* Foundational knowledge of Electrical Engineering applicable to pipeline systems is a plus.
* Effective problem\\-solving skills and ability to optimize engineering designs to match project requirements.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a relevant engineering field (Mechanical, Civil, or Electrical) or equivalent work experience.
* Familiarity with international standards such as ASME, API, or ASTM is highly desirable.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in cross\\-functional and remote teams.

title: SDE Internship (remote)
description:

 Cehpoint is a forward\\-thinking IT and cybersecurity company, specialising in delivering secure, scalable, and intelligent technology solutions. Founded by ethical hackers and experienced IT professionals, we combine cutting\\-edge technical expertise with proactive security practices to enable businesses to succeed in today's digital landscape. Our offerings range from software development and cloud infrastructure to cybersecurity services such as penetration testing and vulnerability assessments. Cehpoint is dedicated to fostering innovation, reliability, and security in every solution we provide, empowering organizations to achieve safe and sustainable growth.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Software Development Engineer (SDE) Intern with a stipend of up to ‚Çπ10,000\\. The SDE Intern will assist in the design, development, and testing of software applications while contributing to backend web development projects. Daily responsibilities include writing and testing code, collaborating with team members, troubleshooting software issues, and gaining hands\\-on experience with software development processes in a collaborative environment.
